channel.title: Request: A server
channel.description:
I dunno of i must post in here, but i try... I try'ed 7 Times to get a working server, 4 times with No-Ip and 3 Times Hamachi. All try's failed... My compiler doesn't work, it only says a error. O___o So i thinked: Maybe someone else can make a server for my... If someone wanna do it for me, i wanna have this following things: NAME: StoneScape NOTE: The one it makes get a MOD positon. And if he really helps after the create an admin position. NOTE2: If i not must post it herem just move it... [LIST] [*]Important things: (If can) NO MAX STATS! If it can, i gonna design some more armor.
I wan't to edit maps, as owner, is that able?
Pest Control.
Some Emotes will teleport. The first to Stoneland. (The place where Jad is, but i gonna add some more monsters and drops) The next to the Abbys. (Ín the ring, not by the monsters)
[*]Commands: [*]::noclip Admin/Owner only commando. The others can't use. [*]::pickup Admin/Owner only commando. The others can't use. [*]::ownerglow - ::ownerglowoff Owner glow. (Owner only) [*]::modglow - ::modglowoff Mod Glow (Mod only) [*]::adminglow - ::adminglowoff Admin Glow. (Admin only) [*]::con Construction. [*]::rich [B](OWNER/ADMIN ONLY) Give you 100M Cash, 100K Of all Party's, 10K off all Runes and 10K Manta Ray's. (All at note) [*]::mrich Give you 1M Cash, 10 Of all Party's, 10K off all Runes and 10K Manta Ray's. (All at note) (And all admin, mod commands, like ::ban and ::kick)
[*] Special shops:
[*]Range Shop: - All things like Arrows, Knifes 2000 invertory, normal sell prices (NOT STREET, SHOP) - Things like bows, 5 invertory, normal Shop Prices. - All The armor, Black d'hide, Blue, ect.
[*]Melee Defence Shop: - All Armors. ALL. (Not only Bronze-Dragon, also Barrows, ect.) [*]Melee Attack Shop: - All Weapens. ALL. (Not only Bronze-Dragon, also Barrows, ect.)
[*]Mage Shop: - All runes, 5000 invertory and Normal Prices, All staffs, Normal prices and 3 Invertory, All Mage Armor (Wizard G, Mystic, ect)
[*]Bone Shop: - All bones and Prayer armor, Prayer books. STREET PRICES.
[*]Barrow shop: - Simple, all Barrows, A full armor 1,5M.
[*]Potion Shop: - All Potions. Super and Normal.
[*]Gloves and Boots Shop: - All Colours Boots and Gloves, also the Armor Gloves and Boots.
That was it, would you do it for me? (Could you host it?)

item.title: Request: A server
item.dc:creator: @Steen Steen
item.description:
@Steen wrote:

I dunno of i must post in here, but i try…
I try’ed 7 Times to get a working server, 4 times with No-Ip and 3 Times Hamachi.
All try’s failed…
My compiler doesn’t work, it only says a error. O___o
So i thinked: Maybe someone else can make a server for my…
If someone wanna do it for me, i wanna have this following things:
NAME: StoneScape
NOTE: The one it makes get a MOD positon. And if he really helps after the create an admin position.
NOTE2: If i not must post it herem just move it…
[LIST]
[*]Important things: (If can)
NO MAX STATS! If it can, i gonna design some more armor.

I wan’t to edit maps, as owner, is that able?

Pest Control.

Some Emotes will teleport.
The first to Stoneland. (The place where Jad is, but i gonna add some more monsters and drops)
The next to the Abbys. (Ín the ring, not by the monsters)

[]Commands:
[]::noclip
Admin/Owner only commando. The others can’t use.
[]::pickup
Admin/Owner only commando. The others can’t use.
[]::ownerglow - ::ownerglowoff
Owner glow. (Owner only)
[]::modglow - ::modglowoff
Mod Glow (Mod only)
[]::adminglow - ::adminglowoff
Admin Glow. (Admin only)
[]::con
Construction.
[]::rich [B](OWNER/ADMIN ONLY)
Give you 100M Cash, 100K Of all Party’s, 10K off all Runes and 10K Manta Ray’s. (All at note)
[*]::mrich
Give you 1M Cash, 10 Of all Party’s, 10K off all Runes and 10K Manta Ray’s. (All at note)
(And all admin, mod commands, like ::ban and ::kick)

[*] Special shops:

[*]Range Shop:

  • All things like Arrows, Knifes 2000 invertory, normal sell prices (NOT STREET, SHOP)
  • Things like bows, 5 invertory, normal Shop Prices.
  • All The armor, Black d’hide, Blue, ect.

[*]Melee Defence Shop:

  • All Armors. ALL. (Not only Bronze-Dragon, also Barrows, ect.)
    [*]Melee Attack Shop:
  • All Weapens. ALL. (Not only Bronze-Dragon, also Barrows, ect.)

[*]Mage Shop:

  • All runes, 5000 invertory and Normal Prices, All staffs, Normal prices and 3 Invertory, All Mage Armor (Wizard G, Mystic, ect)

[*]Bone Shop:

  • All bones and Prayer armor, Prayer books. STREET PRICES.

[*]Barrow shop:

  • Simple, all Barrows, A full armor 1,5M.

[*]Potion Shop:

  • All Potions. Super and Normal.

[*]Gloves and Boots Shop:

  • All Colours Boots and Gloves, also the Armor Gloves and Boots.

That was it, would you do it for me?
(Could you host it?)

Read full topic
